channel.title: Elementary school on Orange
channel.description: Recent content in Elementary school on Orange

item.title: How to grow trees in a marmalade factory?
item.description: What if we told you that it is possible to teach data mining to kids in elementary school in an enjoyable way? You’d say, “Impossible!” and “That’s too much to ask of a kid!”. We say, “Just watch; it can be done in a fun and informative way that will help these kids learn fundamental logical thinking patterns!” A week before our Tuesday visit, the kids from Alojzij Šuštar elementary school in Ljubljana took a trip to the Ljubljana Zoo, paying close attention to animals and their features.
